thread.title: Russian government dismisses claims intelligence officials in contact with Donald Trump election campaign
thread.title_full: Russian government dismisses claims intelligence officials in contact with Donald Trump election campaign

author: Lizzie Dearden
title: Russian government dismisses claims intelligence officials in contact with Donald Trump election campaign
text:
36   US 
A spokesperson for the Russian government has dismissed allegations that the country’s intelligence officials were in repeated contact with Donald Trump’s team ahead of the US election. 
“Let's not believe anonymous information,” Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told reporters. 
“It's a newspaper report which is not based on any facts.” 
There has been no comment from the White House or American security services on claims published by the New York Times. More about:
